hero.title: Rise Forward Foundation
hero.mission: We accelerate economic mobility through AI, data, and digital skills education wrapped in compliant workforce pathways.

sections.title: Why This Platform
bullets: Single stack: LMS + Compliance + Payments + Partner Gateway
Faster intake: funding eligibility scaffolds and reporting hooks

sections.title: Pricing
sections.copy: Simple, transparent pricing for workforce development ecosystems. Start with a codebase license or scale to hosted multi-tenant delivery and enterprise compliance support.

compliance.title: Workforce Compliance & Funding Enablement
compliance.intro: Structured to support WIOA, PIRL, and state-level reporting readiness with progressive enhancement phases.

pillars.name: Eligibility & Intake
pillars.detail: Structured data capture aligned to funding pathways

pillars.name: Evidence & Audit Trail
pillars.detail: Planned evidence item registry & export packs

pillars.name: Reporting Hooks
pillars.detail: PIRL schema mapping stubs with roadmap to automation

licensing.title: Licensing & Ecosystem Access
licensing.narrative: Choose the model that aligns with your deployment, compliance oversight, and customization needs.

pricing.title: Platform Pricing
pricing.intro: Representative starter pricing. Stripe price IDs can be mapped in environment variables for production checkout integration.

plans.name: Codebase License
plans.description: Source access, single organization deployment rights.

plans.name: Annual SaaS
plans.description: Hosted multi-tenant platform, updates & baseline support.

plans.name: Whitelabel
plans.description: Custom domain, branding extensions, advanced theming.
